name: Choco Pixel 6
description:
Choco Pixel 6 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space avoiding traps and choosing the right directions to avoid dead ends.

In Choco Pixel 6:

- Traps
- Chocolate
- Sweets
- Cool music
- 50 levels
- Pixel art
